name: Lost Time: Scream Jam 2019
description:
The experiment has gone horribly wrong. The government plans to bomb the lab, and rightfully so. Within it are things that should never see the light of day.
However, you are still inside.

You don't have time to delay and wait around. You must run, using the lab's internal trams if you have to. But not too fast, not too reckless, as to not alert... them.

Game by Will Fish
Made for Scream Jam 2019.
Breathing Sound by ASH KIRK from Freesound

Controls

- WASD or Arrow Keys : Move

- Hold Ctrl : Sprint

- E : Interact

- Hold Space : View Watch and Map
